definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: In view of the age of the accused the magistrate give him a suspend sentence.
sentences.chinese: 鑑於被告的年齡，治安法官給他緩期處刑。

sentences.english: Therefore the execution will go forward as stipulated under the laws of the State of California.
sentences.chinese: 因此，根據洛杉磯州的法律處刑將立即執行。

sentences.english: Having taken the age of the accused into consideration, the court has decided to give him a suspended sentence.
sentences.chinese: 考慮到被告的年齡，法院決定給他緩期處刑。

sentences.english: Previous conviction refers to the facts that someone has been proclaimed crime or has been sentenced to penalties.
sentences.chinese: 前科是指曾經被宣告犯有罪或被判處刑罰的事實。

sentences.english: Zhang will be sentenced at a later date.
sentences.chinese: 張某將在晚些時候被判處刑罰。

sentences.english: Procedure of pleading guilty and sentencing is not established at all.
sentences.chinese: 認罪處刑程序可以說基本未建立。

sentences.english: The horror of the footage triggered a wave of public condemnation of war crimes.
sentences.chinese: 處刑畫面的血腥恐怖重新激起大衆對戰爭罪行的唾棄。
